name: ASMSharp
tagline: ASMSharp is an open source C#/C++ based work-in-progress assembly IDE.
body:
##Notes/Known issues:##

Editor is preset to support SIC/XE.

##TODO List:

- Implement a SIC/XE assembler in C++
- Implement a SIC/XE simulator that supports debugging in C++

##Long term goals:

- Implement/Include a linker.
- Add support for real machines (Intel/AMD 32/64bit)
- Implement a resource editor.
- Implement a disassembler.
- Implement/Integrate a debugger.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
